name: Cepheus
description:
Chloe is an employee in Delta-3, sent to find out what happened in the central Cepheus, which has being attacked by aliens and its robots!

Your in grave danger, your gun has been possesed by one of this aliens, and now your ammo hurts you as well!

Find out the truth about what happened and be careful with your ammo.

Don't let things get out of control and save Cepheus!

Game Designers : 

- Darsodios // Tw: @Darsodios

- Dandy // Tw: @DandyIsTaken
